name: THE MAN WHO REMADE ALL THE BOXES
name_original: THE MAN WHO REMADE ALL THE BOXES
description:
alright yo, this game is for WAVEICE i haven't checked out his channel for a long time and im like 9999 years late to his gameplay of my game but YO he's awesome

sub to him or die

this game is made with puzzlescript, it's a game where you go through strange worlds as the one and only ness, push boxes, and meet a nervous boi or whatever heck just play this game please
